strict_legal.introduction: Pursuant to the Fair Credit Reporting Act, 15 U.S.C. ยง 1681 et seq., I hereby formally dispute the accuracy of certain information contained in my consumer credit file maintained by your agency.
strict_legal.legal_basis: This dispute implicates multiple provisions of the Fair Credit Reporting Act, including but not limited to the sections enumerated below.
strict_legal.violations: Upon review of my credit report, I have identified the following inaccuracies, each of which constitutes a violation of FCRA accuracy requirements.
strict_legal.metro2: The disputed information fails to comply with CDIA Metro-2 Format requirements, representing procedural violations under FCRA Section 607(b).
strict_legal.mov: A reasonable reinvestigation requires more than mere furnisher confirmation. I demand production of original source documentation.
strict_legal.case_law: The legal standards governing your reinvestigation obligations are well-established in federal case law.
strict_legal.demands: Based upon the foregoing violations and applicable law, I make the following formal demands.
strict_legal.conclusion: I reserve all rights and remedies available under the Fair Credit Reporting Act.
